snippet.title: 63 Little Pieces - Trailer #2
snippet.description:
63 Little Pieces is an atmospheric block sliding puzzle game with an emotional driven narrative.

Shoot and destroy walls in order to build paths towards the goal.
Collect the keys to open up what lies locked and shattered inside.
Will you be able to piece it back together?

Now in early access and available for Windows and OUYA at Itch.io:
https://samuelsousa.itch.io/little-pieces

#Puzzle #Indie #Games
